title: Bulwarx Cybersecurity Platform
description: Internal Portal for a Leading Global Cybersecurity Company. Designed and developed a comprehensive internal portal that serves as a central hub for employees and partners.
overview: The client was established following in-depth research, planning, and UI specification based on cybersecurity best practices. I designed and developed a comprehensive internal portal that serves as a central hub for employees and partners, focusing on security workflows and real-time threat monitoring.
process: My primary focus was on user-centered design and process engineering. I collaborated with security professionals to understand complex workflows and translate them into intuitive user interfaces. The process involved extensive user research, wireframing, prototyping, and iterative testing.
impact: The result is a cohesive, user-friendly portal that significantly improved workflow efficiency by 40% and enhanced user satisfaction within the cybersecurity operations. The portal now serves as a central tool for enhancing engagement and internal communications.

title: DeviceChef Restaurant Management
description: Event-Driven Restaurant Management System with real-time monitoring capabilities and advanced analytics for kitchen operations.
overview: Restaurant owners needed a unified platform to manage orders, inventory, staff scheduling, and real-time kitchen operations. The existing systems were fragmented and lacked real-time capabilities, creating inefficiencies during peak hours.
process: Created an event-driven architecture with real-time updates, intuitive dashboard design, and comprehensive analytics. The approach focused on minimizing cognitive load for kitchen staff during peak hours while providing comprehensive management tools for owners.
impact: The platform resulted in 40% faster order processing, reduced food waste by 30%, and improved overall kitchen efficiency significantly. Multi-location support enabled franchise growth.

title: Ginegar E-commerce Platform
description: E-commerce Platform for a Global Agricultural Products Company specializing in greenhouse solutions and agricultural products.
overview: A leading global agricultural company needed to transition from traditional B2B sales to a digital-first approach, requiring a platform that could handle complex agricultural product catalogs, international shipping, and multi-language support.
process: Designed a clean, nature-inspired interface with intuitive product categorization, advanced filtering options, and seamless checkout experience. Implemented multi-currency support and localized content management across 15 countries.
impact: The platform launched successfully across 15 countries, resulting in 60% increase in online sales and significantly expanded market reach. Customer satisfaction improved with streamlined ordering process.
